Detailed Description

template<class T>
class Hypertable::RefHolder< T >

Used to pass parameter to the scope guard by reference e.g.

: inline void decr(int &x) { --x; }

void example() { int i = 0; ScopedGuard guard = make_guard(decr, by_ref(i)); // ... }
